<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bashing Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=5813) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 77 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

You smash, bust, and charge through solid obstacles without hesitation. Stride twice. Once during your movement, if your movement passes through or ends adjacent to a door, window, fence, wall, or similar obstacle, you can attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=2375) the obstacle with a +1 circumstance bonus to the roll; on a failure, your movement ends at that obstacle.
name: Bashing Charge
